attributes.action: Increase the size of the Royal Navy to include the following.....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The following number of ships would allow the Royal Navy to operate two independent task forces capable of dealing with any treat posed by any modern Navy or Air forces as well as being able to help with any humanitarian disaster in the future.

Two 65,000 Carriers
Two 20,00 escort carriers
Two offensive missle Cruisers
Two Helicopter Carriers
Four Assult Ships
Ten Type 45 Destroyers
Twenty Frigates
Ten Attack Subs
5 Nuclear Subs
Twenty patrol vessles (FOR SECURE BORDERS)
Five mine sweepers
